mdRecord.dcterms:title: Importance of Being Earnest
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Oscar Wilde's the Importance of Being Earnest. Presented by Rex Partington, Producing Director. Directed by Ada Brown Mather. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Tony Partington. Scenic Design by Rex Partington. 48th Season. 1980.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
